§ Fuerza-T

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Fuerza-T** are action-figure toys created by **Top Toys** in [[argentina]] using the original [[masters-of-the-universe]] molds for plastic-injection-molding.

§§ Characters

**Fuerza-T** had 12 knowns characters:

• [[fuerza-t-platino]]
• [[fuerza-t-shidoshi]]
• [[fuerza-t-titano]]
• [[fuerza-t-tekno]]
• [[fuerza-t-carnivor]]
• [[fuerza-t-destructor]]
• [[fuerza-t-felinor]]
• [[fuerza-t-pantano]]
• [[fuerza-t-prince-goldar]]
• [[fuerza-t-spector]]
• [[fuerza-t-silvar]]
• [[fuerza-t-infector]]

§§ Toys

Only 8 of the 12 characters were released as toys:

• [[fuerza-t-platino]]
• [[fuerza-t-shidoshi]]
• [[fuerza-t-titano]]
• [[fuerza-t-tekno]]
• [[fuerza-t-carnivor]]
• [[fuerza-t-destructor]]
• [[fuerza-t-felinor]]
• [[fuerza-t-pantano]]

Photos exist of the remaining 4 of the 12 characters, but it is believed that they were never released as toys:

• [[fuerza-t-prince-goldar]]
• [[fuerza-t-spector]]
• [[fuerza-t-silvar]]
• [[fuerza-t-infector]]
